plugins.name: Super PDF
plugins.description:
Super PDF is your all-in-one plugin for import, export, merge, and viewing PDF files directly within Figma and FigJam. Experience super-fast performance and high-quality results, whether you're designing, reading, or combining frames and sections into a single PDF file. Free and private.


Import mode

Effortlessly drag and drop (or click to select) multiple PDF files using Super resolution. Perfect for integrating external documents into your design workflow in super quality. That's it. Check settings to customize your preferences in Figma and FigJam.


Export mode

Seamlessly select frames, sections, or other design elements to merge into a single, high-quality PDF. Ideal for creating presentation slides and comprehensive documentation. Export as single combined PDF file from your selections.

Sort pages by time created, name (alphabetically) or by number. Exporting PDFs in super high quality perfect for presentation slides and documentation.


Reader / viewer mode

Instantly open and view PDF files within Figma and FigJam with Super resolution, ensuring clarity and precision.


Plugin features

Free for Figma and FigJam: Enjoy all features at no cost.

Super Fast Import: Auto-import multiple PDF files with Super resolution.

High-Quality Export: Combine frames into a single PDF file with exceptional quality and reduced file size.

Fast PDF Viewer: View and read PDFs with Super resolution.

Accurate and Reliable: Ensure high quality and accuracy for every PDF file.

Easy to use: Customize Settings to your preference.

Analytics Tracking: Monitor your PDF imports, exports, and reader usage.


Get in touch

Leave a comment here, send an email to support or reach out to @titanas for any questions and requests.


Your data stays with you

100% private. No file upload to servers. No network access. No tracking. No back-end.


Plugin analytics are stored locally and only you have access to it. That means if cache is cleared or the plugin is uninstalled, analytics will be deleted and lost.

accepted.name: Stefanos
accepted.description: Making big little things with meraki.

plugins.tagline: Import, export, merge, combine, view, read PDFs in Figma and FigJam super fast. Free and private.

plugins.name: Appearance
plugins.description:
This plugin generates a dark/light theme from your selection.

The plugin works with external library styles and local styles.

You can choose styles name identification in settings. By default, the plugin use [day] for light and [night] for dark.


🤓 How it works:

1. Use [day] and [night] in your style names. Example: Style name[day]/ Style name[night].

2. Apply your color styles.

3. Select any object, then choose Appearance → Dark mode or Appearance → Light mode.


📔 How it works with external library styles:

1. Open external library file and use [day] and [night] in color style names. Example: Style name[day]/ Style name[night].

2. Publish changes.

3. Select Appearance → Save styles for saving external color styles to the plugin.

4. Open any file linked to the library.

5. Apply color styles.

6. Select any object then choose Appearance → Dark mode or Appearance → Light mode


---


✏️ Name examples:

You can use [day] / [night] at any place of your style names.




Color name [day]

Color name [night]




Style [day] / color-name

Style [night] / color-name




Style / color-name [day]

Style / color-name [night]

accepted.name: Alex Dyakov
accepted.description: Designer at Yandex.Maps

plugins.name: Contento
plugins.description:
Features


Magic Fill

A feature to apply data in objects.


Folders

A way to organize contents and fuels up Magic Fill.


Discover

"Discover" is the place to discover more contents, having a lot of PNG (transparent background) image stocks, previewing and playing around with format options and very easily duplicating them into your own collections.


Apply Content for Sublayers

Many times when applying data, selecting multiple list elements individually will become very cumbersome. In Contento, you only need to select the parent layer, and apply different contents to sublayers that have different names.


Unsplash Photos

You can choose photos from Unsplash to create image library. You can also provide any external image urls.


Content Types & Settings

Any Image Library provides settings:

  • Pixel: "auto" by default, which automatically chooses pixels according to the width & height of each layer individually. Note: this feature is only for Unsplash image urls.
  • Order: random / ascending

Any Number Library provides settings:

  • Min value
  • Max value
  • Prefix
  • Suffix
  • Decimal number
  • Thousand separators
  • Order

Any Date & time Library provides settings:

  • Date format
  • Time format
  • Time range
  • Order

Any Serial number Library provides settings:

  • Start value
  • Interval value
  • Places
  • Prefix
  • Suffix

Any Text Library provides settings:

  • Order
  • Prefix
  • Suffix


Custom Libraries

You can create custom content libraries with types like text, image, number, date & time and serial number.
plugins.tagline: Content applier you love.

85659.release_notes:
New features:

1. Folders: Contento now supports a new type a content - folders. Apparently you can put sub-content inside a folder, but the real power is you can apply "Magic Fill" in the scope of a folder.

2. Bulk actions: you can now "Delete" or "Move to folder" in bulk.

3. Apply content in editor: sometimes we want to apply some data temporarily but not want to save them to our content list. For this kind of situations, Contento now supports applying data directly in the editor. (Also support shortcut: holding command key and the main call to action will turn to "Apply")

4. Continuous creation: now you can hold alt key in content editor and click "Create and Continue", then you can stay in the editor and start creating the next content.

plugins.name: Colorwell
plugins.description:
Colorwell is like having a painters mixing palette in Figma. Select your mixing color, and spin the color mixer to mix it in. Then use or save the currently mixed color to your palette or Figma design.


The advanced color mixing algorithm used in Colorwell implements the Kubelka & Munk theory to predict realistic color mixing behavior.


Features


  • Advanced paint-like color mixing algorithm.
  • Color palettes are saved per Figma document.
  • Sample colors in your palette from your Figma document.
  • Mix in or out the currently selected mixing color by rotating the color mixer clockwise or counterclockwise.
  • Build a new palette from an image by dragging an image file onto the Colorwell window.
  • Easily use the currently mixed color by copying its hex value, or having Colorwell apply as a fill or stroke to the currently selected layers in your Figma document.


Colorwell's mixing algorithm is provided by the wonderful team behind Mixbox. Learn more about it from their YouTube Talk.

accepted.name: Dustin Mierau
accepted.description: Cofound and led design at Path. Helped build Napster for macOS. Making Figma plugins that I find useful in my own work and hope you do too. 😊

plugins.tagline: Mix colors like paint in Figma.

plugins.name: Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Check contrast in your UI design based on Contrast Success Criteria 1.4.3 and 1.4.6 of the Web Content Accessibility Guideline (WCAG).


How it works:

  1. Select colors;
  2. Confirm the colors;
  3. The application will inform you if the contrast is good for normal sized texts and large text (above 18 points);
  4. The reset button clears the interface, but it doesn't need to be pressed for you to recheck.


For informational purposes:

  1. Level A: Bad, ineffective;
  2. Level AA: Good, effective;
  3. Level AAA: Great, excellent.


Created as an object of study.
plugins.tagline: Check contrast in your UI design

plugins.name: Find in page
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you search for layers/text in by a phrase.

You can also:

  1. Multi-select results
  2. Click on a result to navigate to it
  3. Replace the phrase you searched in all locations


If you like it, please like and comment. It will help others to see the value as well :)


Watch demo here.

Support my work here <3


How to use:

  1. Select search scope (Selection / Page / File)
  2. Type a phrase (or multiple phrases separated by comma)
  3. Select if to 'match word'
  4. Select search elements (Layers / Texts)
  5. If 'Layers' selected - Choose layer type
  6. Run the plugin
  7. Click on the result name to zoom on layer
  8. Select all / specific result
  9. Replace the phrase you typed in the layers names / texts with new phrase


Important notes:

  1. Don't search for phrases that will return lots of results. It will take a long time to get them or the plugin will crash.
  2. You can't select all / replace multiple layers when the results contain layers from different pages
plugins.tagline: Find and select elements in your file easily

plugins.name: FishText in Russian by Pavel Sherer
plugins.description:
Самый удобный генератор случайного текста, умный Lorem Ipsum на русском языке.


C помощью этого плагина можно в пару кликов создать как отдельные предложения и заголовки, так и целые абзацы отменнейшего fishtext'а. Кроме того, он умеет заполнять текстовые слои, учитывая их высоту и ширину.


Что умеет плагин:

  1. заполнять выбранный текстовый слой рыбой (с учётом ширины и высоты слоя);
  2. пихать в выбранный текстовый слой указанное количество рыбатекста;
  3. создавать текстовый слой внутри выбранной группы/фрейма/компонента;
  4. запоминать настройки, чтобы вам не пришлось каждый раз выбирать одни и те же параметры — благодаря этому типовые действия (вроде заполнения текстом слоёв) выполняются ещё быстрее;
  5. валидировать выбор слоёв и сразу показывать подсказки.


Просто выберите:

  1. один или несколько текстовых слоёв — и плагин запихнёт в каждый из них указанное количество русского lorem ipsum;
  2. отдельный фрейм/компонент/группу — плагин сам создаст внутри них новый слой с dummy-текстом;
  3. ничего — да, если не выделить ничего, текстовый слой с рыбой будет помещён в корень вашего макета.


Если отметить чекбокс «Заполнить текстовый слой рыбой», то выбранные слои заполнятся текстом полностью, с учётом своего размера.


--


Официальный плагин ресурса fish-text.ru


--


Random text generator, smart Lorem Ipsum in Russian.

accepted.name: Pavel Sherer
accepted.description: Producer, Product Designer of IT-solutions

plugins.tagline: Самый удобный генератор случайного текста, умный Lorem Ipsum на русском языке

plugins.name: A Selector
plugins.description:
A powerful tool for finding and selecting elements, you can flexibly cross select various elements by various attributes of the element. Supported languages: Chinese, English, Spanish.


一个强大的查找和选择元素的工具，你可以通过元素的各种属性来灵活的交叉选择各种元素，支持中英、西班牙语。


If helpful please click the ❤️.


🔍 支持以下过滤方式 Supported filtering methods：


搜索图层名称 By Layer Name


按查找层级 By search hierarchy:


未选择元素或查找范围为整个文档时 No selected or search the entire document：

  • 所有元素 All elements
  • 根元素 Root element （页面的子级元素 Child of the page)

选中一个或多个元素时 One or more elements are selected: ：

  • 内在元素 Inside （包含被选择元素自身及其所有子孙元素 The selected element and all children)
  • 同级元素 Siblings
  • 子级元素 Child
  • 子孙元素 Children


按元素类型或排除类型选择 Select by element type or exclusion type ( 可多选 Multiple ) :

  • 所有 All（不区分类型 Regardless of type)
  • 组件 Components
  • 组件集 Components Set
  • 实例 Instances
  • 框架 Frames
  • 自动布局 Auto Layout
  • 组 Groups
  • 章节 Section
  • 图片 Images
  • 文本 Text
  • 小部件 Widget
  • 连接线 Connector
  • 便签 Sticky
  • 高亮 High Light (Figjam only)
  • 内嵌媒体 Embed (Figjam only)
  • 代码块Code (Figjam only)
  • 链接扩展 Link Unfurl (Figjam only)
  • 胶带 Washi Tape
  • 媒体 Media (Figjam only)
  • 图章 Stamp
  • 切片 Slices
  • 方形 Rectangle
  • 布尔形状 Boolean
  • 形状 Shapes
  • 线条 Lines
  • 圆形
  • 三角形 Triangles
  • 星形 Stars
  • 文字形状 Shape with Text


按状态或排除状态 Status or exclusion Status

( 可多选 Multiple )：

  • 所有 All ( 不区分 Unclassified )
  • 无填充 No Fills
  • 无描边 No Strokes
  • 隐藏的图层（图层的眼睛关闭的状态，要同时查找透明度为零或填充透明度为0的元素请在属性过滤里添加对应的属性） Hidden layers (the layer's eyes are closed, add the corresponding properties in the Filter properties to find elements with zero opacity at the same time)
  • 锁定的图层 Locked layers
  • 蒙版 Masks
  • 无子元素的图层 Layers with no child elements
  • 剪切子元素的框架 Frames for clipping child elements
  • 包含导出的图层 Contain exported layers


按属性 Props ( 可叠加 Multiple )：

图层相关属性 Layer ：

  • 图层透明度 Layer opacity
  • 元素X坐标 X
  • 元素Y坐标 Y
  • 元素宽度 Width
  • 元素高度 Height
  • 元素在父图层中的倒序 Order number of elements in parent (layer panel)
  • 元素在父图层中的倒序 Order number of elements in parent (layer panel reverse)
  • 子元素数量 Number of Children
  • 旋转角度 Rotation
  • 图层是否展开 Expanded
  • 图层叠加模式 Blend Mode
  • 图层网格 Layout Grids
  • 网格样式 ID Grid Style Id
  • 多边形边数 Polygon Sides


绝对渲染边界 Absolute Render Bounds：

  • 绝对宽度 Absolute Render Width
  • 绝对高度 Absolute Render Height
  • 绝对X Absolute X
  • 绝对Y Absolute Y


填充相关属性 Fills：

  • 填充色 Fills Color
  • 填充叠加模式 Fills Blend Mode
  • 填充透明度 Fills Opacity
  • 填充类型 Fills Type
  • 填充是否可见 Fills Visible
  • 完整填充样式 Fully Fills Style （匹配被选择元素的所有填充样式 Matches all fill styles of the selected element）
  • 填充样式ID Fills Style ID （通过ID来匹配样式 Matches style by ID）


图层圆角 Radius:

  • 圆角: All Radius
  • 左上 Radius-top left
  • 右上 Radius-top right
  • 左下 Radius-bottom left
  • 右下 Radius-bottom right
  • 转角平滑 Corner Smoothing


描边相关属性 Strokes：

  • 描边颜色 Strokes Color
  • 描边透明度 Strokes Opacity
  • 描边叠加模式 Strokes Blend Mode
  • 描边类型 Strokes Type
  • 描边可见度 Strokes Visible
  • 描边对齐 Strokes Align
  • 描边端点 Strokes Cap
  • 描边转角 Strokes Join
  • 描边斜接限制 Strokes Miter Limit
  • 完整描边样式 Fully Strokes Style （匹配被选择元素的所有描边样式 Matches all Strokes styles of the selected element）
  • 描边样式ID Strokes Style ID （通过ID来匹配样式 Matches style by ID）


图层效果 Effects：

  • 完整效果样式 Fully Effects
  • 效果样式ID Effect Style ID


自动布局相关属性 Auto layout：

  • 排列方向 Direction
  • 元素间距 Items Spacing
  • 上内边距 Padding Top
  • 下内边距 Padding Bottom
  • 左内边距 Padding Left
  • 右内边距 Padding Right
  • 图层定位 Layout Position


文本相关属性 Text：

  • 文本内容 Characters
  • 字体 Font Family
  • 字重 Font Weight
  • 字号 Font Size
  • 是否有链接 Hyperlink
  • 水平对齐 Horizontal Align
  • 垂直对齐 Vertical Align
  • 文字修饰 Text Decoration
  • 文本间距 Letter Spacing
  • 文本间距单位 Letter Spacing Unit
  • 行高 Line Height
  • 行高单位 Line Height Unit
  • 是否包含丢失字体 Has Missing Font
  • 段落缩进 Paragraph Indent
  • 段落间距 Paragraph Spacing
  • 文字样式ID Text Style ID


组件相关 Component：

  • 组件描述 Description
  • 相同母组件ID | Main Component ID


交互相关 Prototype：

  • 交互动作 Reactions
  • 滚动溢出方向 Overflow Scrolling
  • 固定子元素数量 Number Of Fixed Children


💻 主要功能说明 Functions：

  • 默认查找当页元素，你可以为想要的结果添加各种过滤。
  • Default find at current page, you can add various filters for desired results.


  • 点击最上方的”当前页“，可以切换到查找整个文档
  • Click”Current Page“，can select "All Files"


  • 选择一个或多个元素后，以选中元素作为基准进行查找，你可以额外的选择一些层级进行过滤。
  • When one or more elements have been selected, you can use the selected element as a benchmark to look up, and you can select additional level for filtering.


  • 选择一个或多个元素后，界面上会显示选中的第一个元素的名称和其他元素的数量，搜索框和属性过滤的输入控件后面会显示一个填充按钮，点击按钮会自动将选中的元素对应的属性值填入。这样你就可以查找相似的元素了。
  • Select one or more elements, the screen will displays the name of the first element selected and the number of other selected elements. The search box and the added properties will display a fill button that automatically fills in the values of the selected elements.Then you can find and select similar layers.



找到查找结果后右下方会显示” 选中所有“、”挨个查看“和”结果列表“按钮，在查找整个文档时只会显示一个结果列表的按钮。结果列表会按页面显示查找到元素，点击列表名称可以收起/展开列表元素，点击具体元素可以直接定位到元素。刚得到查找结果后如果数量有点多，点击结果列表按钮可能会有点延迟，此时可以多次点击。


When the results are found, the 'select all', 'View by view,' and 'result list' buttons are displayed in the lower right corner, and only one result list button is displayed when the whole document is searched. The result list will display the found elements according to the page. Click the list name to collapse/expand the list element, and click the specific element to directly locate the element.If the number of search results is a little high, results list will not work good to show, so you can click it several times.


🛠 额外功能 Additional functionality：


点击右上角比较不明显的icon会进入额外的功能界面，目前只有一个功能——一键清除参考线


Clicking on the less obvious icon in the upper right corner will bring you into the interface of additional functions. Currently, there are only functions -- Clear the guide line.



需要更多查找方式和功能可以留言，

You can leave a message if you need more search methods and functions,


✉️ 如果使用中遇到问题或有任何建议，可以通过以下方式联系我：

If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions, you can contact me through the following ways:

Make A Selector better!

💻 主要功能说明 Functions：

  • 默认查找当页元素，你可以为想要的结果添加各种过滤。
  • Default find at current page, you can add various filters for desired results.


  • 点击最上方的”当前页“，可以切换到查找整个文档
  • Click”Current Page“，can select "All Files"


  • 选择一个或多个元素后，以选中元素作为基准进行查找，你可以额外的选择一些层级进行过滤。
  • When one or more elements have been selected, you can use the selected element as a benchmark to look up, and you can select additional level for filtering.


  • 选择一个或多个元素后，界面上会显示选中的第一个元素的名称和其他元素的数量，搜索框和属性过滤的输入控件后面会显示一个填充按钮，点击按钮会自动将选中的元素对应的属性值填入。这样你就可以查找相似的元素了。
  • Select one or more elements, the screen will displays the name of the first element selected and the number of other selected elements. The search box and the added properties will display a fill button that automatically fills in the values of the selected elements.Then you can find and select similar layers.



找到查找结果后右下方会显示” 选中所有“、”挨个查看“和”结果列表“按钮，在查找整个文档时只会显示一个结果列表的按钮。结果列表会按页面显示查找到元素，点击列表名称可以收起/展开列表元素，点击具体元素可以直接定位到元素。刚得到查找结果后如果数量有点多，点击结果列表按钮可能会有点延迟，此时可以多次点击。


When the results are found, the 'select all', 'View by view,' and 'result list' buttons are displayed in the lower right corner, and only one result list button is displayed when the whole document is searched. The result list will display the found elements according to the page. Click the list name to collapse/expand the list element, and click the specific element to directly locate the element.If the number of search results is a little high, results list will not work good to show, so you can click it several times.

plugins.name: Gifmock
plugins.description:
Gifmock is a tool that helps you create high-quality GIFs from static images and mockups.


gifmock.com


Here is how it works:

1. Select layers to create GIF frames

2. Adjust the delay and position of your frames with pixel-perfect precision

3. Export


SMART CROPPING

Crop all your frames in a few clicks to highlight a specific part of your design.


PIXEL PREVIEW

Pan and zoom on the canvas to position your frames with pixel precision.


MEASUREMENT

Hold option to show distance from the edge when moving your frame.


RETINA SUPPORT

You can import and export at the resolution you like. 1x, 2x, 3x, you decide.


PER FRAME DELAY

Want to pause on a frame for a few seconds? Set the delay of your choice on any frame.


SECURE

Gifmock stores your GIF data on your machine. None of your content is saved on the cloud.


FRAME ORDERING

New frames are automatically ordered. Re-order them with a simple drag-and-drop.


RELIABLE

Established in 2017, Gifmock has a proven track record of being reliable.

accepted.name: Steven Fabre
accepted.description: Co-founder, Liveblocks

plugins.name: Table Builder
plugins.description:
Table Builder lets you create and update tables by pasting tabular data from your spread sheets.


For each entry in the spread sheet, Table Builder creates an instance of your original cell component, positions it in a grid and updates the cell's first child of type `text` with the data entry from the spreadsheet (Excel, Numbers, etc).


Demo


Video – Generate new table

Video – Update existing table


Usage


Create a new table


  1. Create a component that contains a text label (make sure the text label's `horizontal resizing` property is set to `Hug` if it uses auto layout)
  2. Select an instance of that component
  3. In the plugins menu, select Table Builder and then Generate new table
  4. Copy tabular data from the spreadsheet and paste it into the text area of the plugin's UI
  5. Click on the Generate table button


Update an existing table


  1. Select a table that was created with Table Builder
  2. In the plugins menu, select Table Builder and then Update existing table
  3. Copy tabular data from the spreadsheet and paste it into the text area of the plugin's UI
  4. Click on the Update table button
plugins.tagline: Create tables ... super fast

The best plugin for writing RTL (Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, etc.) or bidirectional text in Figma or FigJam. Based on feedbacks 😎


You can support my works on free Figma plugins with a coffee ☕️


Pay with gumroad (USD)

Pay with PayPing (IRR)


It reverses the text to show it correctly and keeps the original text to restore it if someday Figma adds RTL support.

Single and Batch Editor

Find & Replace

Multi-layer reverse

reset

rewrap

handle special characters and braces

auto hide editor when no text selected

Quick Tutorial video on youtube


If you only need the reverse command, you can also use RTL PLZ Reverse plugin.


You can use the RTL PLZ Handoff plugin to prepare text layers with original texts for handing off the design to developers.


Ways to use:

  • Create text layer > enter RTL text > Run RTL PLZ Reverse
  • Create/Select text layer > Run RTL PLZ Editor > Type/Paste text in the plugin window
  • If the width of the textbox is not auto, Run RTL PLZ Update Wrap after the textbox resizes.
  • If the plugin window is open, it will update lines when the text layer is resized.

plugins.name: Vimeo Record
plugins.description:
Bring excitement back to virtual collaboration with video messaging


The Vimeo Record plugin allows you to record your screen, webcam, or both directly from the files you’re collaborating on in Figma and FigJam. This means that you can spend less time typing out your feedback, and more time capturing ideas right as inspiration strikes.


To leave live feedback in FigJam, simply record your comments in the file of choice, then watch your video preview unfurl alongside your work. When working on a project in Figma Design, you can embed your video as a thumbnail directly on the Figma canvas. Your collaborators can then watch your comments, ideas, or accolades via simple playback within your whiteboard or canvas.


Here’s how your team can use Vimeo Record to work better together:


  • Project onboarding: Record a short welcome video to review goals, progress, and next steps so new team members can get up to speed quickly without the need for another meeting or lengthy email.
  • Design feedback: Highlight specific visual elements while narrating your feedback to keep your ideas in context.
  • Async ideation: Share your ideas at the moment inspiration strikes to add more engaging context to your projects -- then let your team watch and respond with comments when it’s convenient for them.


How to get started:

  1. Download the Vimeo Record plugin
  2. Connect Vimeo to your Figma account
  3. Select recording modes
  4. Create your video
  5. Add video to canvas or share link to it with your team
  6. Check this How-to article for more details
  7. Install Vimeo Record Chrome Extension to record videos wherever you go
plugins.tagline: Record and share unlimited free video messages.

91924.name: Vimeo Record
91924.description:
Bring excitement back to virtual collaboration with video messaging


The Vimeo Record plugin allows you to record your screen, webcam, or both directly from the files you’re collaborating on in Figma and FigJam. This means that you can spend less time typing out your feedback, and more time capturing ideas right as inspiration strikes.


To leave live feedback in FigJam, simply record your comments in the file of choice, then watch your video preview unfurl alongside your work. When working on a project in Figma Design, you can embed your video as a thumbnail directly on the Figma canvas. Your collaborators can then watch your comments, ideas, or accolades via simple playback within your whiteboard or canvas.


Here’s how your team can use Vimeo Record to work better together:


  • Project onboarding: Record a short welcome video to review goals, progress, and next steps so new team members can get up to speed quickly without the need for another meeting or lengthy email.
  • Design feedback: Highlight specific visual elements while narrating your feedback to keep your ideas in context.
  • Async ideation: Share your ideas at the moment inspiration strikes to add more engaging context to your projects -- then let your team watch and respond with comments when it’s convenient for them.


How to get started:

  1. Download the Vimeo Record plugin
  2. Connect Vimeo to your Figma account
  3. Select recording modes
  4. Create your video
  5. Add video to canvas or share link to it with your team
  6. Check this How-to article for more details
  7. Install Vimeo Record Chrome Extension to record videos wherever you go
91924.tagline: Record and share unlimited free video messages.

plugins.name: Realtime Colors
plugins.description:
Using this plugin, you can directly create a palette on Figma from any of your selected colors on RealtimeColors.com.


How to use:

  1. Choose favorite colors on the site.
  2. Click on "Share Link" from the toolbar or use shortcut CTRL + S
  3. Paste the link in the plugin.
  4. Get a color palette and corresponding color styles in the project


Learn more + Tutorial: About Realtime Colors Figma Plugin


Features (v3):

  • Palette generated in an organized frame for your style guides
  • Automatically generated color styles across a project
  • Organized color styles as 'text,' 'background,' 'accent,' and two button styles, 'primary' and 'secondary.'
  • Color styles will automatically update all across your project when generating a new palette, so you don't have to re-apply the new colors on every element manually.


Suggestions? Feedback? Let me know in the comments!

plugins.name: Tailwind Color Palettes - TailwindCSS Import & Export
plugins.description:
This plugin will add Tailwind Color Styles to your Figma file. You can choose between the available presets.


Features:

  1. You can select the following presets from the dropdown - Tailwind v4, Tailwind v3, Tailwind v2, Tailwind v1 and Tailwind UI (deprecated)
  2. In addition you can generate a custom file using the tailwind.config.js file content using this file generator
  3. You can import the palette that you've create tailwind.ink using the generator and custom file upload feature
  4. Export the local color styles as CSS/JSON with RGB/HSL/OKLCH support.


Note:

There could be minute differences in the color values. For example oklch(0.637 0.237 25.331) becomes oklch(63.79% 0.2373 25.44deg) in the plugin. This happens due to the conversion from tailwind color to Figma color and Figma color to tailwind config color in the "export" feature.

So the values are slightly off in the "export" feature. I will try to improve it.


If you enjoy this plugin, please follow me on twitter.


Thanks!

plugins.name: Figment.so - Figma to Website
plugins.description:
Turn your Figma design into a website without a single line of code.


The Figment process:

  1. Design website
  2. Run Figment plugin
  3. Publish website
  4. Drink coffee


When you run it, the Figment plugin will do a bunch of translations under the hood to convert the design over to a website, for a modestly-sized website this process can take up to 10 seconds - so please be patient!


Once it finishes, you will be asked whether this design is meant for Mobile or Desktop screens (don't worry, you can export both into the same website). Finally, after selecting a screen type, your website design will be hosted on our editor so that you can make some final changes to it, such as adding links, textfields, videos, etc.


Give it a try now and host your first website completely free!


Need support?

DM us on Twitter:

@useFigment


Built with ❤️ by @nikita_builds and @tknndy

plugins.name: Android Resources Export
plugins.description:
Export png, nine-patch, adaptive icon in Android folder structure (drawable-xhdpi, etc..).


TIPS


- Run "New PNG" will add slice layers for every selected layers. You can aslo add slice layer by yourself, or add a export to layer.


- You must use "New Nine-Patch" to create a nine-patch asset, or duplicate a nine-patch asset then change the content.


- Before running "Export PNG" or "Export Nine-Patch", you can select some assets, they will be listed on plugin UI. And if have no selected layer in page, it will list all assets in document.


- You can use the "Export PNG" or "Export Nine-Patch" plugin button on the inspector panel to export assets.


- Click the preview image of asset on plugin UI, you can show the layer center in canvas.


- If you change the layer or asset name when plugin running, you need to run plugin again (cmd+alt+p) to apply the change.


- Run "New App Icon" will create icon template in a new page, you can create multiple icons. Select the app icon page, hide all icon grid layer then run "Export App Icon" to export it.

plugins.name: Timer
plugins.description:
Use text to create a timer on a Figma page.

There are two ways to start a timer:

1. Type the time you want to count down in Timer: HH:MM:SS format (e.g. Timer: 5:00), then press 'Start'.
2. Type the time you want to count down in HH:MM:SS format (e.g. 5:00). In this case you need to select the text layer before pressing 'Start'

Additionally, you can now start a couple of timers on a page (for whatever reason).

Checkout Timebox ⏱ for a collection of Timers that work great with this plugin: https://www.figma.com/community/file/824677652393376493.

plugins.name: GitHub
plugins.description:
Note: This plugin does not work with self-hosted GitHub instances (GitHub Enterprise Server or "GHES")


Connect design to code with the GitHub plugin for Dev Mode. With this plugin you can link GitHub files, issues, and pull requests to Figma component and designs, so you always have the context you need in one place.


Use the plugin to…

  • Link components in GitHub to components in Figma, so that when developers are implementing designs they know whether a component already exists in the codebase and which one to use.
  • Link GitHub issues to Figma designs, so developers have all of the context needed to implement a design.
  • Link GitHub pull requests to Figma designs, so that teammates can track implementation of a design.
  • View linked GitHub files, issues, and pull requests in Figma for quick previews without context switching.


Learn more about Dev Mode here. (https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/15023124644247)


---

This is licensed under Figma’s Terms of Service, unless you have a different agreement with us for Figma Services, and any use of GitHub is subject to your agreement with GitHub.
